description: React component for handling OAuth/authentication callback using Supabase client, which exchanges the URL code for a session and redirects user afterward.

methods.name: AuthCallback()
methods.description: React functional component that manages the authentication callback process.

callbacks.name: useEffect
callbacks.description: React hook used to run side-effects after component mount.

callbacks.name: run
callbacks.description: Asynchronous function to handle session exchange with Supabase after redirect.
